i1.name: Monkey's Agility
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Udyr's''' [[champion ability|abilities]] generate a [[stack]] of ''Monkey's Agility'' for 5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent ability casts. Each stack grants him {{sti|ms|{{as|5 '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and {{sti|{{as|10% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, up to {{as|15 '''bonus''' movement speed}} and {{as|30% '''bonus''' attack speed}} at 3 stacks.

{{sbc|Innate - Four Stances:}} '''Udyr''' has no [[Champion ability|ultimate ability]] and instead has 4 [[Champion ability|basic abilities]]. Each of his abilities provides a passive effect that lasts until he activates a different ability, called his current ''Stance''. Activating any of his abilities will prevent his previous ''Stance'' from triggering any more on-hit effects, and will place his other abilities on a {{fd|1.5}}-second {{sti|cooldown}} if they are not on cooldown or have a remaining cooldown greater than {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
Starting at [[Experience (champion)|level]] 16, all abilities can gain a 6th rank.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Udyr's champion ability generate a stack of Monkey's Agility for 5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent ability casts. Each stack grants him 5 bonus movement speed and 10% bonus attack speed, up to 15 bonus movement speed and 30% bonus attack speed at 3 stacks.
Innate - Four Stances: Udyr has no Champion ability and instead has 4 Champion ability. Each of his abilities provides a passive effect that lasts until he activates a different ability, called his current Stance. Activating any of his abilities will prevent his previous Stance from triggering any more on-hit effects, and will place his other abilities on a 1.5-second cooldown if they are not on cooldown or have a remaining cooldown greater than 1.5 seconds.
Starting at Experience (champion) 16, all abilities can gain a 6th rank.
i1.notes:
* {{bi|Cloud Dragon Soul|possessive=true}} bonus movement speed is special cased to activate on all of '''Udyr's''' spell casts due to not having a traditional ultimate.
* {{bi|Cloudbringer's Grace}} does not grant ultimate cooldown reduction, instead it grants {{pp|key=%|type=stacks|5 to 5*4 for 4}} reduced cooldowns on all abilities.
* Further stance activations at maximum stacks of ''Monkey's Agility'' will refresh the timer.
* Despite having 4 abilities each with 6 ranks, '''Udyr''' is not able to level beyond the usual limit under normal circumstances - meaning he must choose how to allocate his points and will not be able to reach maximum rank on each of his abilities, except in {{tip|Ultra Rapid Fire}}.

q1.name: Tiger Stance
description: {{sbc|Stance:}} '''Udyr's''' [[basic attack]]s generate ''Tiger'' stacks [[attack effects|on-hit]], up to 3. At maximum stacks, '''Udyr's''' next basic attack is a ''Tiger Strike'', which deals {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} over 2 seconds as well as instantly dealing any remaining damage from any previous ''Tiger Strikes'' on the target.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Udyr''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 5 seconds, and instantly generates 3 ''Tiger'' stacks.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Stance: Udyr's basic attacks generate Tiger stacks attack effects, up to 3. At maximum stacks, Udyr's next basic attack is a Tiger Strike, which deals bonus physical damage over 2 seconds as well as instantly dealing any remaining damage from any previous Tiger Strikes on the target.
Active: Udyr gains bonus attack speed for 5 seconds, and instantly generates 3 Tiger stacks.
leveling: {{st|Total Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|30 to 180 6}} {{as|(+ {{ap|110 to 185 6}}% AD)}}|Damage Per Half-Second|{{ap|30/4 to 180/4 6}} {{as|(+ {{ap|110/4 to 185/4 6}}% AD)}}}}
q1.notes:
* The name of the buff granted by entering ''Tiger Stance'' is ''Tiger Speed''.
* The triggering attack will generate the first stack toward the next, meaning the effect will always trigger on every 3rd attack. {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} will reduce this number to every 2nd attack, with '''Udyr's''' attack animations coded to "look ahead" and trigger the empowered-attack animation if he attacks a target while at 1 stack while ''Guinsoo's Rage'' is active. 
* ''Tiger Stance's'' primed {{tip|damage over time}} does not persist through stance changes.
* Unlike most on-hit physical damage, the bonus damage from ''Tiger Stance'' will not apply {{sti|life steal|link=true}}.
* The on-hit application of the DoT cannot be {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}} nor {{ai|Spirit's Refuge|Shen|blocked}}, but it can {{tip|blind|miss}}.
q1.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  {{pp|45 to 28}} as 45/41.6/38.2/34.8/31.4/28 and riot's value 45,45,45,45,45,45 as 45

w1.name: Turtle Stance
description: {{sbc|Stance:}} '''Udyr's''' basic attacks generate ''Turtle'' stacks on-hit, up to 3. At maximum stacks, '''Udyr's''' next basic attack {{tip|heal|heals}} him for {{sti|health|{{as|{{pp|type='''missing''' health|key=%|2.5 to 5 for 11|key1=%|0 to 100|formula=2.5% increased by 1% per 1% of '''missing''' health}} of his '''maximum''' health|health}}}}.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Udyr''' {{tip|shields}} himself for up to 5 seconds, and instantly generates 3 ''Turtle'' stacks.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Stance: Udyr's basic attacks generate Turtle stacks on-hit, up to 3. At maximum stacks, Udyr's next basic attack heals him for 0 to 100 â€’ undefined of his maximum health.
Active: Udyr shields himself for up to 5 seconds, and instantly generates 3 Turtle stacks.
w1.notes:
* The name of the buff granted by entering ''Turtle Stance'' is ''Spiritual Shell''.
* The triggering attack will generate the first stack toward the next, meaning the effect will always trigger on every 3rd attack. {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} will reduce this number to every 2nd attack, with '''Udyr's''' attack animations coded to "look ahead" and trigger the empowered-attack animation if he attacks a target while at 1 stack while ''Guinsoo's Rage'' is active.
w1.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  {{pp|45 to 28}} as 45/41.6/38.2/34.8/31.4/28 and riot's value 45,45,45,45,45,45 as 45

e1.name: Bear Stance
description: {{sbc|Stance:}} '''Udyr's''' basic attacks are {{tip|unstoppable basic attack|unstoppable}} and they {{tip|stun}} his target for 1 second. The stun cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Udyr''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and is {{tip|ghosted}} for the next few seconds. Additionally, his basic attacks for the duration against targets not on cooldown by ''Bear Stance'' are empowered to gain {{sti|50 '''bonus''' range}} and make him {{tip|lunge}} at the target.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Stance: Udyr's basic attacks are unstoppable and they stun his target for 1 second. The stun cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
Active: Udyr gains bonus movement speed and is ghosted for the next few seconds. Additionally, his basic attacks for the duration against targets not on cooldown by Bear Stance are empowered to gain 50 bonus range and make him lunge at the target.
leveling:
{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|15 to 40 6}}%}}
{{st|Bonus Movement Speed Duration|{{ap|2 to 3.25 6}}}}
e1.notes:
* The name of the buff granted by entering ''Bear Stance'' is ''Primal Charge''.
* ''Bear Stance's'' self-displacement does '''not''' count as a {{tip|dash}} for the purposes of {{ri|Sudden Impact}}. 
* The triggering attack will apply other {{tip|on-hit}} effects and can [[critical strike|critically strike]] as normal.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} and {{tip|cc-immune|crowd control immunity}} will consume the attack, meaning the on-target stun immunity is also incurred in the process.
e1.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  {{pp|45 to 28}} as 45/41.6/38.2/34.8/31.4/28 and riot's value 45,45,45,45,45,45 as 45

effects.str:
• Bonus Movement Speed: %

  • Bonus Movement Speed Duration:

r1.name: Phoenix Stance
description: {{sbc|Stance:}} '''Udyr's''' basic attacks generate ''Phoenix'' stacks on-hit, up to 3. At maximum stacks, '''Udyr's''' next basic attack unleashes fire in a cone in front of him that deals {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Udyr''' unleashes an [[aura]] of pulsing waves of fire around himself for 4 seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} each second to all nearby enemies for the duration, as well as instantly generating 3 ''Phoenix'' stacks.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Stance: Udyr's basic attacks generate Phoenix stacks on-hit, up to 3. At maximum stacks, Udyr's next basic attack unleashes fire in a cone in front of him that deals magic damage to all enemies hit.
Active: Udyr unleashes an aura of pulsing waves of fire around himself for 4 seconds, dealing magic damage each second to all nearby enemies for the duration, as well as instantly generating 3 Phoenix stacks.
leveling: {{st|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|50 to 300 6}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}|Magic Damage Per Second|{{ap|50/4 to 300/4 6}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
* The name of the buff granted by entering ''Phoenix Stance'' is ''Phoenix Flame''.
* The triggering attack will generate the first stack toward the next, meaning the effect will always trigger on every 3rd attack. {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} will reduce this number to every 2nd attack, with '''Udyr's''' attack animations coded to "look ahead" and trigger the empowered-attack animation if he attacks a target while at 1 stack while ''Guinsoo's Rage'' is active.
r1.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  {{pp|45 to 28}} as 45/41.6/38.2/34.8/31.4/28 and riot's value 45,45,45,45,45,45 as 45
